crypto module¶

crypto.decrypt(private_key_string, data_path, ouput_path, chunkSize=65536)¶

Decrypt a file.

Parameters

  • private_key_string (str) – Private key to use for decrypting symmetric key.

  • data_path (str) – Path to file to decrypt.

  • output_path (str) – Path to output file.

  • chunkSize (int) – Size of chunks of a file encrypted at one moment. The greater this value, the greater memory consumption (default 65536).

crypto.decryptToFile(data_path, output_path, cipher, data_offset, filesize, chunkSize)¶

Decrypt a file.

Parameters

  • data_path (str) – Path to file to decrypt.

  • output_path (str) – Path to output file.

  • cipher – AES cipher object for decrypting data.

  • data_offset (int) – Position of begining of encrypted data in file.

  • filesize (int) – Desired size of output file, read from the file header.

  • chunkSize (int) – Size of chunks of a file encrypted at one moment. The greater this value, the greater memory consumption.

crypto.encrypt(encModeStr, public_key_string, data_path, ouput_path, chunkSize=65536)¶

Encrypt a file.

Parameters

  • encModeStr (str) – Chaining mode to use for encryption e.g. ‘CBC’.

  • public_key_string (str) – Public key to use for encrypting symmetric key.

  • data_path (str) – Path to file to encrypt.

  • output_path (str) – Path to output file.

  • chunkSize (int) – Size of chunks of a file encrypted at one moment. The greater this value, the greater memory consumption (default 65536).

crypto.encryptToFile(data_path, header, output_path, cipher, chunkSize)¶

Encrypt a file.

Parameters

  • data_path (str) – Path to file to encrypt.

  • header (str) – json formatted string with header for encrypted file.

  • output_path (str) – Path to output file.

  • cipher – AES cipher object for encrypting data.

  • chunkSize (int) – Size of chunks of a file encrypted at one moment. The greater this value, the greater memory consumption.

crypto.makeCipher(encModeStr: str, sym_key: bytes, filesize: int, initBytes=None)¶

Create an AES cipher of a desired mode.

Parameters

  • encModeStr (str) – Chaining mode to use for encryption or decryption e.g. ‘CBC’.

  • sym_key (bytes) – The secret key to use in the symmetric cipher.

  • filesize (int) – Size of a file to encrypt or decrypt.

  • initBytes (bytes, bytearray, memoryview or None) – Initial bytes to be used as either initialization vector or nonce (default None).

Returns

an AES object.

crypto.makeHeader(cipher, sym_key: bytes, encModeStr: str, public_key_string: str, filesize: int) → str¶

Create a json formatted header.

Parameters

  • cipher – AES cipher object.

  • sym_key (bytes) – The secret key used in the cipher.

  • encModeStr (str) – Chaining mode used in cipher e.g. ‘CBC’.

  • public_key_string (str) – Public key to use for encrypting sym_key.

  • filesize (int) – Size of a file to encrypt.

Returns

json formatted header

Return type

str
